comment.body:
> [villoldo](#comment_2_16nZf7G4qaYRtFpHM9MM1A32nV5oqU9TW1): 
> But evil code in a site I display makes me a little bit uneasy. Can ZeroNet sites be a vector for ransomware or is it save because of the sandbox features of modern browsers?

Did you know **flash player** has recently been a vector for ransomware?  Be very careful with embeddings.
